original: Vanditvā ratanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, nissāya pubbake garuṃ;
analyzed: vanditvā ratanam seṭṭham nissāya pubbake garum
itthī puttoca dāsoca gharā vāsaḥ katākato
kinte hi pāda sussasā ye saṃ natthi garūn iha
su taḥ pi tassa ta ādisaḥ
sak kaccaṃ yaḥ upaṭṭhāti su taḥ pi tassa ta ādisaḥ
ak khare su pade su ca
mahussāhena tat ṭhānam gantabbam vasu tesinā
tatas ācariya uraññaḥ tatas jinassa sāsanam
tatas vuḍḍhā namovādaḥ tatas jinassa sāsanam
suti sammuti saṅkhyā ca yoga aniti visesakā
tikicchā aitihāsāca joti māyā ca chandati
ketumanta aca saddāca sippa aṭṭhā rasa kāime
sippam samam dhanam na atthi sippam corān a gaṇhanti
idha loke sippaṃmittam para loke sukha āvaham
sa dese pūjitaḥ rājā budhaḥ sabbattha pūjitaḥ
rūpa yobbanna sampannā visāla kula sambhavā
na sobhati sabhā majjhe haṃsa majjhe bakaḥ yathā
sabba sutam adhiyate hīnam ukkaṭṭha majjhime
sabbassa attham jāneyya na ca sabbam payojaye
tam hi inaḥ go samaḥ bhave
paññāya attham jānanti ñātaḥ atthaḥ sukha āvahaḥ
anāgatam bhayam disvā dūra tā upari vat jaye
saddhā ahirica uttappam bāhu saccam viraṃsati
sa dese pūjitaḥ rājā budhaḥ sabbattha pūjitaḥ
paṇḍita upaṇḍitena iva vaṇṇitaḥ vasu vaṇṇitaḥ
attham mahantam āpajjam vijjam sampattim eva ca
na a labbham atipatthenti na ṭhampi naca so care
guṇa dosesu nekena atthi koci vivajjito
na lokaḥ vijjamānam pi cande passa tilañjanam
nadī tīre iṭṭhite kūpe araṇi tāla vaṇḍake
bālaḥ upuṭṭhaḥ apuṭṭhaḥ pi bahum vikatthate sadā
guṇa sampanna alaṅkāro sabba satta hita āvahaḥ
tam pi ca iva a sakkontaḥ pāpāt tānam viyojaye
cakkhu mā assa yathā andhaḥ sotavā badhiraḥ yathā
ati jātam manu jātam puttam icchanti paṇḍitā
nasā sabhā yattha na santi santaḥ
na te santo yena vadanti dhammaṃ
rāgan ca dosan ca pahāya moham
bāle cummattake bhūpe guru mātā pitūsu api
saṅghe jeṭhe ca bhātari na dosa ākariyā budhā
atta nāma notā pañca gharet uccaritāni ca
icchanti yā tena ca iva paṇḍitā
sattam hukkhaliyam pakkam bhājane pi tathā bhave
nami lakkhā samīpa ṭṭhā evaṃbālā bahussute
appassutaḥ sutam appam bahu maññati mānikaḥ
āpa upāpa iti mudukam sādhu vācā cakakkhaḷam
na a siddhi mudunā akiñci yatas uta uta mudunā ajaye

original: Candanaṃ sītalaṃ loke, tato candaṃva sītalaṃ;

analyzed: candana canda sītamhā sādhu vākyam su bhāsitam
sīta vācaḥ bahu mittaḥ pharusaḥ tu amittakaḥ
upamaṃ ettha ñātabbā canda sūriya rājunam
sa upakāram pi udāsīnam nanu diṭṭham nadī jalam
vācāya kusalena ṭṭhe icchitabbaṃ na sijjhati
uragānam dhanam visam bhūpālānam dhanam balam
na rūpam na ca paññāṇam na ca kulañca sambhavaḥ
kāla vippatti sampatte dhana meva visesakam
dhanavantam vasā ivanti dhanam loke mahā sakhā
sattā asat upasevanti sa udakam vā api ādikam
sabhogam sa dhanañca iva tucchāte ced jahanti te
na hi lakkhim alakkhiñca aññaḥ aññassa kāritaḥ
ya t tha de se na samānaḥ na pīti na ca bandhavaḥ
na santa utattha va santi avisesa karenakaḥ
calati ekena pādena tiṭṭhati ekena paṇḍitaḥ
na a samikkhya paraṃṭhānam pubbam āyatanam ca je
ṭhāna bhaṭṭhāna sobhante dantā kesā nakhā narā
iti viññāya matimā saṭhānam na lahum ca je
anaggham ratanam maṇi hemam nissāya sobhate
tatas niggaṇhikam sāmim na iva a paggaṇhikam tatas
na seve atta datthamhi na seve ati santake
mahantam nissayam katvā khuddakopi mahā bhave
hema pabbatam nissāya hema pakkhībhavanti te
rukkha asu bhūmi nissāya puppha phalaṃ pavaḍḍhati
an alasaḥ a caṇḍikkaḥ a saṭṭha usu ci sacca vā
a luddhaḥ attha kāmaḥ ca tam uttam uttamaḥ naraḥ
ahite paṭisedhaḥ ca hite suca niyojako
byasana iccā pariccāgaḥ saṅkhepa mitta lakkhaṇam
āture byasane sace dubbhikkhe para viggahe
yathā usadhañca sāduñca roga hārīca sajjano
yaḥ dhuvāni paricajja a dhuvānā upasevati
dhuva ani tassa nassa nti a dhuve su kathā vakā
luddham atthena gaṇheyya thaddham añjathi kammunā
chanda anuvattiyām uḷham yathā bhūtena paṇḍitam
sacca abhikkhaṇa saṃsaggāḥ a samosaraṇena ca
tasmāt na abhikkhaṇam gacche na ca gacche cirāciram
kalyāṇa mittam āgamma sabbe te ihonti pāṇinam
sukhitam dukkhitam hontam so bālaḥ yaḥ na passati
athiram pithiram maññe attā naṃ sassatī samam
bāla udha pāpakam katvā na tam chaṭṭitum ussahe
kim byaggha ādi gacchantaḥ padam makkhetum ussahe
an avhāyaṃgamayantaḥ a pucchā bahu bhāsakaḥ
yathā cuṭṭamparā pakkāḥ bahirattakam eva ca
yad ūna kam saṇa titam yam pūram santam eva tam
aḍḍhakumbha upamaḥ bālaḥ yaṃpūra kumbha uva paṇḍitaḥ
muḷha sissa upadesena kunārī bharaṇena ca
dujjana uti cayam āha su janam dujjana usayam
nasā sabba rase bhu tvāt vinā suddhe natus sati
mud udujjana cittam na kiṃlohena pamīyate
tasmāt ujjana saṃsaggam āsi vīsam iva uragam
sabba uduṭṭha ukhala uduṭṭhaḥ sabba āduṭṭhatara ukhalaḥ
asatam sampayogena santaḥ pi asantaḥ bhave
kusāpi putim vā āyanti evaṃbāla upasevanā
nasaḥ dhammam vijānāti dabbi sūparasam yathā
phalam vekadalin hanti hanti veḷu naḷam phalam
maṇḍūka upinukka usīhaḥ sukara upinukka udīpi
bila ārosa disaḥ byagghaḥ duppaññaḥ pina paññavā
tiṇāni bhūmi codakam catuttham vākya suṭṭhutam
etāni hi sataṃgehe na uchijjante kadācid pi
ākiṇṇaḥ api a sabbhīdha a saṃsaṭṭhaḥ uvabhaddakaḥ
bahunā āsanna jātena gacche na aummattakena
yathā capana sāpakkāḥ bahisaṇḍakam eva ca
khippam dhammam vijānāti jivhāsu uparasam yathā
balaṃ pakkhīnam ākāsaḥ macchānam udakaṃ balaṃ
balam candaḥ balam sūraḥ balam samaṇa brahmaṇā
gati migānam pavanam ākāsa upakkhinam gati
careyya kula jam paññaḥ virūpam a vi kaññakam
sāma ami gakkhī sukesī tanu majjhima dantavā
sabba kāma haram posam bhattāram na atimaññati
na ca api svatthi bhattāram icchā ācārena rosaye
evaṃvat tatiyā nārī bhattu chanda vasā anugā
gaṇheyya vātam jālena sāgaram eka pāṇinā
eka udara samuppannāḥ na bhavanti samassamā
nānā vaṇṇa a nānā carā yathā badara kaṇḍakā
a damme bahavaḥ dose damme tu bahavaḥ guṇe
tasmāt an apekkhitvāna tam maggam maggaye budhaḥ
niggaṇhe niggaṇhā raham paggaṇhe paggaṇhā raham
saddhā pe me asantesu māsa kaṃpi satam gaṇe
tasmā seṭṭha naraḥ loke dhanam sippam pariggahe
sabbadā api dhanam rakkhe dāram rakkhe dhanam pica
na sādhāraṇa dārassa na bhuñjesā dum ekakaḥ
tappeyya anna pānena sadā samaṇa brahmaṇā
pubba sira si medhāvī dīgha āyu dakkhiṇaṃsiraḥ
pacchimam yasasi bhuñje no bhuñje uttaram mukham
yocasitam ca oṇham ca tiṇābhiyyonam aññati
manta bheda bhayātassa dāsa bhūtaḥ titikkhati
dhana dhañña payogesu tathā vid jāgamesu ca
dūte ca byāhāresu cattaḥ lajjam sadā bhave
na hi koci kate kicce kattāram sam apekkhate
upakāraṃhitena iva sattunā a sattum uddhare
pāda laggam karaṭṭhena kaṇḍakena iva kaṇḍakam
kicca a ni kubbassa kareyya kiccam
dijaḥ vat u maṃkhiṇa phalam ñatvā
caje ekam kulaḥ sattham gāmaḥ sattham kulam caje
gāmam jana padassattham attattham pathaviṃca je
dhanam ca je aṅgam varaḥ sahetu
dhanam aṅgam jīvitam ca api sabbam
yaḥ adhippannam sahati yaḥ ca jānāti desanam
payatana uvagantabbaḥ maccu pāṇa harān iti
sattham su nicchitam api iti vicintanīyam
sa ārādhitaḥ upi avanipa upari saṅkanīyaḥ
sattha avanīpa yuvatī su kutas vasītam
siṅgim paññāsa hatthena sa tena vāhanam caje
paccakkhe gara vosaṃse parokkhe mitta bandhave
sine kāmoca kodhocaḥ ime pañca sine sine
tiṇena vaṭṭate rajju tena nāgaḥ pibandhate
dānam yasassi bhesajjam maccheram kappa nosadham
mahantam vaṭṭa rukkha ādim khudda bījam bahu pphalam
mahā bhogāḥ vinassanti hīna bhāvaḥ idam phalam
ati sītam ati uṇham ati sāyam idam ahu
na visāse amittassa mittam ca api na visāse
kadāci kuppita umittaḥ sabba dosa pakāsako
ku desam ca ku mittam ca ku sambandham kubandhavam
kudārañcaku rājānam dūratas upari vat jaye
kakkaṭaḥ asīsaḥ yāti sabbā padā uvagacchati
hīna puttaḥ rājā amaccaḥ bāla puttaḥ pi paṇḍitaḥ
kula jātaḥ kula puttaḥ kula vaṃsa su rakkhito
samiddha udhana dhaññena na kaṭṭha uda tiṇaggihi
saṅghaḥ sa yuddham ca mahā balehi
dvārā nimad cussava danti vid vā
dehi iti vacana dvārā dehaṭṭhā pañca devatā
sajja niyya nti dhi kitti mati hīri sirīpi ca
natthi iti vacanam dukkham dehi iti vacanam tathā
na tattha mānaṃkiriyāḥ jane va samaññātake
mātā ahīnaḥ sa dubbhāsā pitā ahīnaḥ sa dukriyā
ācāra ukula makkhāti desa makkhati bhāsitam
sambhava upemam akkhāti deham akkhāti bhojanam
javena bhadram jānanti vahena ca bali baddham
jāneyya pesana ibhaccam bandha vam pi bhaya āgame
vinā sattham na jānanti kālam sabbe pi jotikā
ratti hīna ūna candaraḥ ūmi hīna ūna sāgaraḥ
haṃsa hīna ūna saṃphullaḥ itthi hīna ūna purisaḥ
a kodham a vihiṃsan ca khantī ca a virodhanam
dasa ite dhamme rājānaḥ appamattena dhāreyyuṃ
etat ca obhayam ñatvā anumajjhaṃsam ācare
na ikanta mudunā a sakkāḥ ekanta ti khiṇena vā
sa raṭṭham vipulam tasmā dhāreyya raṭṭha bhāravā
rasam cassa na jānāti bījam cassa vinassati
mahā rukkha upamam raṭṭham adhammena pasāsati
mahā rukkha upamam raṭṭham dhammena yā upasāsati
tathā iva negamehiṃsam ye yuttā kaya vikkaye
pahāra vara khettaññū saṅgām ekata nissame
tathā iva esayaḥ hiṃsam saṃyame brahmacāriyaḥ
adhamma cāri khattiyaḥ sa saggena virujjhati
yadā sīlam ca paññam ca soceyyam ca adhigacchati
atha visa asi ta utamhi guyhañ cassana rakkhati
nāsad āyemi gehaññe sa rāja vasatiṃvase
sammataḥ asmi iti āruḍhe sa rāja vasatiṃvase
na pūjitaḥ maññamānaḥ medhāvī paṇḍitaḥ naraḥ
puttam vā a bhātaram vā api sampaggaṇhāti khattiyaḥ
hattha ārohe a nikaṭṭhe rathike patti kārake
tesaṃ kamma avadhānena rāja avaḍḍha iti vettanam
cāpa uvūn ūda rocassa vaṃsa uvāpi pa kampayye
ca apovūnūda rocassa macchovassa a jivhakaḥ
a vitiṇṇam mitam vācam pattha kāle udīraye
vi ni taḥ sippa vā dantaḥ yatat to niyataḥ mudu
bhattāram eva udikkheyya na ca aññassa rājinaḥ
samaṇe brahmaṇe ca api sīlavante bahussute
ā sajja pañhe puccheyyaḥ ā kaṅkham vuḍḍhimattano
naca kiñci nivāreyya dāna kāle iva ṇibbake
puttam vā a bhātaram vā api sīlesu a samāhitam
dāse kamma kare pose sīle su su samāhite
sīla vāca alobha ucaḥ anurutta uca rājino
a saṅkusaka vuttiḥ sa sa rāja vasatiṃvase
ucchādana inhāpane ca dhote pāde adosiram
kim eva sabba kāmānam na dādam dhīram uttamam
kāma iti nid dhanaḥ yoca yoca kuppati anissaraḥ
chabbidhaḥ hoti sīlena a sīlena api chabbidhaḥ
bahu ssutaḥ vuṭṭhānaḥ ca mīro sugati gāmiko
mātā pitā agaru satthā dāyakaḥ dhamma desako
dhamma attha kāma mokkhānam pāṇo saṃsiddhi kāraṇam
satham dīgha āyukaḥ sabba sattānam sukha kāraṇam
na ja hā ti ga ja u tathā
sāra gandham na jahāti dukkha pattaḥ pi paṇḍitaḥ
attā aniyata uñāti attā aniyata uripu
karonti sat janāya iva natam niti mātā matam
su jānā guṇam icchanti dosam icchanti dujjanā
soka ṭhāna sahassāni bhaya ṭhāna satāni ca
sādhu naṃna khala samāgama akhalat tam
dosam parassa passanti atta dosam na passati
tila mattam para dosam nāḷikeram na passati
kodhaḥ attham na jānāti kodhaḥ dhammam na passati
cakkhu upi piya dassane sāgara upi mahā jale
a santuṭṭhaḥ yati naṭṭhaḥ santuṭṭhaḥ pi mahīpati
bhū pāṇṇa vaggi thī sippī abhijjhā luca puggalaḥ
ārogyam paramam lābham santuṭṭhī paramam dhanam
visāsa uparamam ñāti nibbānam paramam sukham
bodhayantina yācanti dehi iti pacchima ajanā
vane vanena candanam ṭhāne ṭhānena paṇḍitam
jinena āgatam sūram dhanam ca geham āgatam
yadā icche samuppanne natam sippam natam dhanam
piyam annam ca pānam ca attha kiccesu paṇḍitam
sabhāyam dhāraye sippam saṅga hāni mahī tale
dubbhikkhe anna dānañca subhikkhe ca hirañña dam
natthi atta samaṃpemam natthi kamma paraṃbalam
kovi desosa vijjānam kopa ropiya vādinam
dubbhikkha ukasinaḥ natthi santānaṃ natthi pāpako
bālitthī makkhikā tuṇḍi isī nañca kamaṇḍalu
malam malataram tatas avijjā paramam malam
itthī nantu natthā iva jātu rakkhā
pasaṃsāsu guṇam hanti hanti cittam asañña tā
asanam bhaya mantānam mad cānam maraṇam bhayam
upamā ettha ñātabbā sūriya canda rājunam
alasaḥ manda buddhiḥ ca sukhitaḥ roga pīḍitaḥ
kalyāṇa kāri kalyāṇam pāpa kārīca pāpakam
puññā pāpa phalam na saddahati saccataḥ
samparāyika ttheyaḥ na saddahati cepi saḥ
saddhā ahirica uttappam bāhu saccam viraṃsati
buddham puppham garu bījam bharagu phalam eva ca
dāna ādīni ca puññāni karontaḥ bodhi aṅkuraḥ
catur āsīti sahassam labhanti pavaram sukham
dukkham pāpassa puññassa sukham missassa missakam
sabbam sadisakam yāti ñātabbam kammunā phalam
dūra eka lābhā varam assa sukkham
sineru vammikam khuddam samudda upātitam yathā
annena atha upānena vatthena sayanena ca
idha iva naṃ pasaṃsanti pacca sagge pamodati
ekassa ikena kappena puggalassa ṭṭhi sañcayaḥ
samam pabbata rāsimhi iti vuttam mahesinā
appa māda ratā ahotha sa cittam anurakkhatha
adhammaḥ nirayam neti dhamma upāpeti suggatim
